name: Ottawa
story: Welcome to Ottawa,where you want to Go for Eat Pizza?
nav: Press 1 for Nepean,2 for barr-haven,3 for kanata

name: Nepean
story: Welcome to Nepean,Choose the rastaurent for Pizza.
nav: Press 1 for Pizza-Pizza,2 for PizzaHut ,3 for Milano Pizza

name: Barr-haven
story: Welcome to Barr-haven,Choose the rastaurent for Pizza.
nav: Press 1 for Pizza-Pizza,2 for PizzaHut ,3 for Milano Pizza

name: Kanata
story: Welcome to Kanata,Choose the rastaurent for Pizza.
nav: Press 1 for Pizza-Pizza,2 for PizzaHut ,3 for Milano Pizza

name: Pizza-Pizza
story: You are in Pizza-Pizza,Choose the Pizza Size.
nav: Press 1 for Small,2 for Medium ,3 for Large.

name: PizzaHut
story: You are in PizzaHut,Choose the Pizza Size.
nav: Press 1 for Small,2 for Medium ,3 for Large.

name: Milano Pizza
story: You are in Milano Pizza,Choose the Pizza Size.
nav: Press 1 for Small,2 for Medium ,3 for Large.

name: Small
story: You Choosen Small Pizza.Please Choose Pizza Type.
nav: Press 1 for Veg-Pizza ,2 for Non-veg Pizza ,3 for All-Pizza

name: Medium
story: You Choosen Medium Pizza.Please Choose Pizza Type.
nav: Press 1 for Veg-Pizza ,2 for Non-veg Pizza ,3 for All-Pizza

name: Large
story: You Choosen Large Pizza.Please Choose Pizza Type.
nav: Press 1 for Veg-Pizza ,2 for Non-veg Pizza ,3 for All-Pizza

name: Veg Pizza
story: You Choosen Veg Pizza.Please select Pizza.
nav: Press 1 for Vegitable Pizza ,2 for SINGLE PIZZA ,3 for TWIN PIZZA

name: Non-veg Pizza
story: You Choosen Non-Veg Pizza.Please select Pizza.
nav: Press 1 for SINGLE PIZZAS ,2 for TWIN PIZZAS ,3 for PARTY PIZZAS

name: All Pizza
story: You Choosen Vegitable Pizza and Non-Vegitable Pizza.Please select Pizza.
nav: Press 1 for Vegitable Pizza,2 for TWIN PIZZA ,3 for PARTY PIZZA

name: Vegitable Pizza
story: You Choosen Vegitable Pizza.Please Choose Pizza ingredients.
nav: Press 1 for (Onion,Capcicum,Tomato) ,2 for (Corn,Bell Paper,Tomato) ,3 for (Spinach,Onion,Tomato)

name: SINGLE PIZZAS
story: Please Choose ingredients for Your SINGLE PIZZA.

name: TWIN PIZZAS

nav: Press 1 for (Onion,Capcicum,Tomato) ,2 for (Corn,Bell Paper,Tomato) ,3 for (Spinach,Onion,Tomato)

name: PARTY PIZZAS

nav: Press 1 for (Onion,Capcicum,Tomato) ,2 for (Corn,Bell Paper,Tomato) ,3 for (Spinach,Onion,Tomato)

name: Onion,Capcicum,Tomato
story: Please select Cheese For Your Pizza.

story: Please select Cheese For Your Pizza.
